Title: Grants retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Christine Fernandez
Summary: Grants retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Christine Fernandez, formerly Christine Lennard, for her 1984--1985 employment with the Voorheesville public library.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Christine Fernandez
